channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Fin des soldes : foncez sur cet aspirateur robot laveur Roborock à -45 % conçu pour les petits espaces
item.description: Roborock n'a plus rien à prouver en matière d'aspirateurs robots, qu'ils soient laveurs ou non. Surtout que ce modèle Qrevo Edge S5A noté 8/10 s'affiche à 549,99 euros au lieu de 999,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: HomeBoost’s app will show you where to save on your utility bills
item.description: The startup is partnering with utilities to help homeowners determine the best upgrades to cut their energy use.

item.title: The AirPods 4 and Google’s 4K streamer are just two of this week’s best deals
item.description: Happy Saturday, folks! After a few weeks of middling deals, we’re starting see things pick up. Some of our favorite deals of the holiday season have returned in some fashion, making now a great time to pick up deal stalwarts like the AirPods 4 with ANC or Google’s TV Streamer (4K). We also stumbled upon […]

item.title: Hollywood Mourns the Surprise Death of Catherine O’Hara
item.description: Actors and directors remember Catherine O'Hara as one of the greats and gone too soon.

item.title: Fitbit users have been given more time to migrate their accounts over to Google
item.description: Fitbit logins were originally set to expire in 2025, but now you've got even more time to take care of the job.

item.title: Rokid AI Glasses Style Review: Surprisingly Tough Competition for Meta’s Ray-Ban
item.description: Meta might have some real competition.

item.title: watchOS fitness apps need to make better use of the Apple Watch’s incredible user interface
item.description: Apple Watch is over a decade old – so why are some apps not leaning into its strengths?

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, February 1 (game #1469)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, February 1 (game #966)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, February 1 (game #700)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: C’est quoi exactement les « Game Key Cards » de la Nintendo Switch 2 ?
item.description: Depuis l’annonce de la Nintendo Switch 2, un élément spécifique alimente les débats depuis de longs mois : les Cartes Clés de jeu, plus connues sous le nom de Game Key Cards.

item.title: Upgrade your home cinema with $200 off the four-star-rated Sonos Arc Ultra
item.description: This Sonos Arc Ultra deal is just $20 away from its all-time record-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Cette structure de matière noire expliquerait enfin l’étrange danse des galaxies autour de la Voie lactée
item.description: La saga de la matière noire en astrophysique et cosmologie se décline sous plusieurs aspects. L'un d'eux concerne une énigme du groupe de galaxies contenant la Voie lactée et Andromède, notamment, et qui vient peut-être de trouver sa solution.

item.title: xAI Wants to Hire Award-Winning Writers to Train Elon Musk’s Stupid AI Chatbot
item.description: How many award-winning writers are desperate enough to train Grok?
